review: Does what it's supposed to do. I've had Roku and Apple TV's, but this does essentially the same thing only in a stick it's a lot cheaper. Makes it easy to access all the Amazon Prime video content, yet still allows me to connect to HuluPlus, Netflix, and a bunch of other apps. I would recommend for an inexpensive alternative to some other competitive devices.
author: W. Christ
